formatted_address: South Beach Avenue, 30 Beach Rd, Singapore 189763
name: Quaich Bar Avant-Garde

reviews.text: Found this bar next to the JW hotel in Singapore and we had last drinks every night as service was great and it was a cute place with a table inside, high tables & lounge chairs outside! Had some starters on our last night and everything was delicious. Thank you Yuki for looking after us during our stay! Singapore see you soon üôè

Top class unique boutique whisky. Knowledgeable staff on the wide variety of whisky and tasting profiles. Hospitality that makes u feel extremely comfortable and at home. What else should I ask for. Splendid. Exclusive. One of the kind. Period.

Amazing whisky experience. They have all variations of whiskeys here. The staff is very courteous and polite. The food options compliment the tasting experience.
Yuki was very kind and accommodating.

We celebrated our Father in Law‚Äôs 70th birthday here. Lovely place with one of the best collections of whisky i have ever seen.

Highly recommend this place if you are a whisky connoisseur.

This is the place to be if you like a quiet place and just hang out with the boys over scotch and cigars.
The service by Zhichen is really good. Took the time to explain the whiskeys and recommended a few bottles based on our tastes.  He even allowed us to taste a limited edition just to see if we like to get one ourselves.
This bar is nicely located not too far from the main road so you get all the breeze while enjoying the cigar too.
All in all an awesome gentleman‚Äôs night out.
